name: Part D Contract Number - September (Historic)
description: This variable is the Medicare Part C contract number for the beneficiary’s Medicare Advantage (MA) plan for a given month (January through December). CMS assigns an identifier to each contract that a managed care plan has with CMS.

additional: coverage.extension[N].valueCoding.display = {corresponding description from valueset specified in .system}
fhirMapping.derived: The discriminator is derived using the year and month from the beneficiaryMonthly.yearMonth column. .  coverage.extension[N].url = 'https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/ptdcntrct01-<year>-<month>'.  the above <year> is pulled from the beneficiaryMonthly table and the yearMonthly column. The <month> is also pulled from this table and column.
